contextId.glQuote: I will test you with happiness

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "envy" may be expressed as an adjective. Alternate translation: "made one's neighbor envious" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "produce" may be expressed as a verb. Alternate translation: "the food that the land produces ... crops from the fields" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "prosperity" may be expressed as an adjective. Alternate translation: "As a person becomes more prosperous" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "rebuke" can be expressed as a verb. Alternate translation: "when wise people rebuke you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])

contextId.occurrenceNote: "the reason for things." This word "explanations" can be expressed as a verb. Alternate translation: "how to explain various things in life" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])

The word "discovery" can be expressed as a verb. The word "adding" here is used as an idiom. Alternate translation: "discovering one thing after another" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-idiom]])

This word "explanation" can be expressed as a verb. See how the phrase "explanations of reality" is translated in [Ecclesiastes 7:25](../07/25.md). Alternate translation: "in order to be able to explain things in life" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])
contextId.glQuote: in order to find an explanation of reality

contextId.occurrenceNote: The nouns "work, "explanation," and "knowledge" can be expressed as verbs. Alternate translation: "the dead do not work or explain or know or have wisdom" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])
contextId.glQuote: there is no work or explanation or knowledge or wisdom

contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "laughter" can be expressed as a verb. Alternate translation: "People prepare food in order to laugh" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])
The word "enjoyment" can be expressed as a verb. Alternate translation: "wine helps people to enjoy life" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-abstractnouns]])

contextId.glQuote: God will bring you into judgment for all these things
